name: Never One Without The Other
description:
Protoype
This is a prototype of 2D co-op oriented shoot'em'up as 

Credits
Game Design, coding, level design - @me
2D art, 2D animations - @SixBone - Artstation gallery
Sounds - copyrights-free

Light & darkness
Lead the fight against an unknown threat (even for us) as the light and darkness. Both must cooperate to defeat the enemy and win.

Each player controls a colored entity. Depending on the color of yours, you have limited action range in the environment such as :
-an entity can't kill another entity of the same color
-an entity can't go through walls of its color

Current features
-3 levels, tutorial included
-base of the concept
-basis sound
-is highly difficult

Controls
All the game is played with a controller, mapped for xinput (Xbox controllers)


Prototype build extra controls
-Invincibility (A) 
-Swap controls (Backspace) 
-Exit game (Escape)
